code:
classDiagram
    %% Paquete model
    class BenchmarkResult {
        +int totalTasks
        +int threads
        +String executorType
        +List~ModeResult~ results
        +String conclusion
    }

    class ModeResult {
        +String mode
        +long executionTimeMs
        +double speedup
        +double efficiency
    }

    BenchmarkResult --> ModeResult : contiene

    %% Paquete task
    class IntensiveTask {
        -int iterations
        +execute() void
        -performCpuIntensiveWork() void
    }

    %% Paquete service
    class BenchmarkService {
        -IntensiveTask intensiveTask
        -AsyncTaskService asyncTaskService
        -ThreadPoolTaskExecutor customTaskExecutor
        -BenchmarkResult lastResult
        -AtomicBoolean running
        +runBenchmark(int, int, String) BenchmarkResult
        +getLastResult() BenchmarkResult
        -runSequentialNs(int) long
        -runWithExecutorServiceNs(int, int, String) long
        -runWithSpringAsyncNs(int, int) long
    }

    class AsyncTaskService {
        +executeTaskAsync(IntensiveTask) CompletableFuture~Void~
    }

    BenchmarkService --> IntensiveTask : ejecuta
    BenchmarkService --> AsyncTaskService : usa
    BenchmarkService --> BenchmarkResult : genera
    BenchmarkService --> ModeResult : construye
    AsyncTaskService --> IntensiveTask : ejecuta async

    %% Paquete config
    class AppConfig {
        +customTaskExecutor() ThreadPoolTaskExecutor
    }

    AppConfig --> BenchmarkService : configura executor para

    %% Paquete controller
    class BenchmarkController {
        -BenchmarkService benchmarkService
        +startBenchmark(int, int, String) ResponseEntity
        +getResult() ResponseEntity
    }

    BenchmarkController --> BenchmarkService : delega a
    BenchmarkController --> BenchmarkResult : devuelve

    %% Relaciones de concurrencia
    class ThreadPoolTaskExecutor {
        <<Spring>>
    }

    class ExecutorService {
        <<Java>>
    }

    class CompletableFuture {
        <<Java>>
    }

    BenchmarkService ..> ExecutorService : crea y usa
    BenchmarkService --> ThreadPoolTaskExecutor : usa
    AsyncTaskService ..> CompletableFuture : retorna
